card_type: Capital One Venture X Rewards Credit Card

benefits.name: Capital One Travel credit
benefits.description: $300 annual credit for bookings made through Capital One Travel.

benefits.name: Anniversary miles bonus
benefits.description: 10,000 anniversary miles each account anniversary (valued at 1¢ per mile).

benefits.name: Uber One membership
benefits.description: Complimentary Uber One membership (through 11/14/2024) with automatic monthly statement credits.

benefits.name: Lounge visits
benefits.description: Track the value of Priority Pass™, Plaza Premium, and Capital One Lounge access for you and authorized users.

benefits.name: Cell phone protection
benefits.description: Coverage for damaged or stolen phones when you pay your bill with the card.

benefits.name: Capital One offers
benefits.description: Track statement credits earned from Capital One Offers.

benefits.name: Points
benefits.description: Track rewards points accrued throughout the year.
